title: A Tiny School District Reaches Far And Wide For New Teachers
text:
A Tiny School District Reaches Far And Wide For New Teachers 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
Small town doesn't quite describe Bethune, Colo. It spans just 0.2 square miles and has a population of 237. There's a post office, but it's...
